DataSource.query:
select
distinct
case
  when instr(kd_schl,'_IMMO') <> 0
  then 'A_KP2_Immobilien'
  else 'A_'||nvl(vvs,'Zentrale')
end,
case
  when kd_schl='_'
  then vertrieb
  else kd_schl
end,
CASE WHEN kd_schl IS NULL or kd_schl='_'THEN
   ''
ELSE
   (
    case 
       when instr(kd_schl,'_IMMO') <> 0
       then substr('KD '||kd_nr||' Immo '||kbez,1,80)
       else substr('KD ' || kd_nr || ' VVS ' || vvs || ' ' || kbez,1,80)
    end
   )
END,
'N',
CASE WHEN kd_schl IS NULL THEN
   ''
ELSE
   'Kunde'
END
from
dtl_nvr_provisionen_neu
where
stichtag = (select stichtag from nvr_parameter)
and kd_schl is not null

ORDER BY 1,2 ASC
